data.name: Mod_BackwardCompatibilityMessage
data.value: Original Node Controller data was imported. Backward compatibility does not provide the transfer of all data, may be required manual adjustments.

data.name: Mod_BackwardCompatibilityWarning
data.value: WARNING: If you make a new save, you will no longer be able to use original Node Controller on this map.

data.name: Mod_LoadFailed
data.value: Load was completed with errors. Failed to load data for {0} nodes.

data.name: Mod_LoadFailedAll
data.value: Load was completed with errors. Failed to load data for all nodes.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_0_1
data.value: [NEW] Added auto mode for main slope direction. [NEW] Added red overlay for short segments (short segments lead wrong vehicle speed). [NEW] Added the ability reset only offset to default. [NEW] Added Polish translation. [FIXED] Fix default node shape calculation. [FIXED] Fix wrong corner calculation on too sloped or too curved segments. [FIXED] Fix broken nodes after reload map without close game. [FIXED] Fix vehicle trailers disappear. [FIXED] Fix road disappear after disasters. [FIXED] Fix wrong train twist direction. [FIXED] Fix node height in asset editor. [FIXED] Fix default offset value. [FIXED] Fix compatibility with TMPE. [FIXED] Fix load data from intersection assets. [FIXED] Fix not deletable pilars after place intersection asset.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_0_2
data.value: [FIXED] Fix node height outside available tiles (5x5). [FIXED] Fix node center position. [FIXED] Fix crosswalk texture. [FIXED] Fix creating button duplicates [FIXED] Fix despaired "Make end straight" button.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_0_4
data.value: [NEW] Added missing dependencies and mod conflict checker. [NEW] Removed segments collision between train/metro tracks. [FIXED] Fix loading offset if value more then 100m. [FIXED] Fix segment direction correction on shifted segment. [FIXED] Fix not main segment calculation on sloped node. [FIXED] Fix crossing and uturn node type. [TRANSLATION] Added Italian translation.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_0_5
data.value: [FIXED] Fix segments collision calculation. [TRANSLATION] Added Chinese Traditional translation.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_1
data.value: [NEW] Added underground mode (hold Shift to select underground node). [NEW] Added nearby nodes overlay. [NEW] Added calculate shift by nearby nodes - set average shift value to node. [NEW] Added calculate shift by intersections - set shift value for all nodes between intersection for smooth transition (like -2,-1,0,+1,+2). [NEW] Added set shift between intersections - set this shift value for all nodes between intersection. [NEW] Added shortcuts, you can bind keys in mod's options. [NEW] Added the ability to hide marking and change rotation on untouchable (like harbor or cargo station) segments. [FIXED] Fixed resetting node style middle nodes after load map. [FIXED] Fixed resetting node style when replace segment. [FIXED] Fixed auto main slope direction calculation.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_1_1
data.value: [FIXED] Fixed not updating nodes after loading map. [NEW] Added selection step over like in MoveIt. Press Ctrl+Space to step over (you can rebind in mod options). [NEW] Added setting "Node is sloped by default". By default this option disabled. [NEW] Added the ability to change node type by scroll wheel. [NEW] Added new icon for UUI button. [NEW] Added warning for Linux users about missing libraries.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_1_2
data.value: [TRANSLATION] Added Indonesian, Korean and Malay translations.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_1_3
data.value: [NEW] Added colored text to tooltips. [NEW] Added the ability to hide original mod button in toolbar If you use UUI mod. [TRANSLATION] Added Turkish translation.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_2
data.value: [NEW] Added the ability to edit decorative networks. Max slope and twist value for decoration networks is 85 degrees. [NEW] Changed game limit for calculation path for pedestrion on intersection: pedestrian no more stuck on wide intersections. [NEW] Added option for insertion nodes: click on segnemt (default behavior like before), click with Ctrl on segment, disabled. [NEW] Added twist options: --- Calculate twist by nearby nodes - set average twist value to node. --- Calculate twist by intersections - set twist value for all nodes between intersection for smooth transition (like -4°,-2°,0°,+2°,+4°). --- Set twist between intersections - set this twist value for all nodes between intersection. [NEW] Added ability to change slope value for each segment on middle node. [NEW] Added the ability to change offset and rotation for end nodes. [UPDATED] Overlay was adapted for too narrow networks. [FIXED] Fixed calculation for nodeless networks. [FIXED] Fixed calculation of node insertion.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_3
data.value: [UPDATED] Added the ability to disable option "fix stuck pedestrian on long intersections" due to complaining about affecting simulation speed. The option is disabled by default, can be enabled in the mod settings. [NEW] Added option "Collision". if you disable it for segment, segment will not have limits for changing offset and can be overlapped by other segments. [NEW] Added option "Nodeless". it makes segment render without node. [NEW] Added the ability to hide unused options. All options exclude offset, shift and rotate can be hidden in the mod settings if you dont use them. [FIXED] Fixed shift calculation on middle nodes. [UPDATED] Max slope value for roads was increased to 60 degrees. [UPDATED] Max tweest value for roads was increased to 60 degrees. [UPDATED] Max shift value was increased to 64 meters. [FIXED] Fixed hole in overlay on such a big nodes. [TRANSLATION] Added Romanian language.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_3_1
data.value: [UPDATED] Added Plazas & Promenades DLC support. [FIXED] Fixed prop positions on twisted segments. [FIXED] Simulation data is not changed from main thread anymore. [FIXED] Fixed missing crosswalk texture on crosswalk nodes.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_3_2
data.value: [FIXED] Fixed terrain glitches that could appear when using Surface Painter mod. [TRANSLATION] Added Czech language.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_3_3
data.value: [FIXED] Fixed compatibility with Adaptive Network mod which could cause blue voids instead of nodes. [FIXED] Fixed error when missed network asset could cause NCR data loading failure.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_4
data.value: [NEW] Added free-form mode that allow to set corner position and rotation without any limitations. [NEW] Added the ability to disable "Follow main slope" for segments that allows to make segments slope independently. [NEW] Added the ability to set delta height for each segment. [UPDATED] Bend nodes follow slope of near nodes, so that segment between them is smoother. [FIXED] Default offset of railways is not set to 0.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage3_5
data.value: [UPDATED] New UI style. [NEW] Allow to change offset and rotation for nodeless segments. [NEW] Allow to move end node in free form mode. [NEW] Added shift to free form mode. [NEW] Added flat end to free form mode. [NEW] Allow to change value with step 0.01 by scrolling the wheel when Alt is being held. [NEW] Hold ctrl to move only by X direction, hold alt to move only by Y direction in free form mode. [NEW] Added option to set overlay opacity. [NEW] Segment overlay color is blinking when its fields on panel is being hovered. [FIXED] Fixed nodeless segment position in free form mode. [FIXED] Fixed default value of corner direction in free form mode. [FIXED] Fixed error while editing nodes which is connected to transport strations or buildings. [TRANSLATION] Added Urkainian translation.

data.name: Settings_DeleteDataMessage
data.value: Do you really want to remove all data?

data.name: Settings_LongIntersectionFix
data.value: Fix stuck pedestrian on long intersections

data.name: Settings_LongIntersectionFixWarning
data.value: This option increase max pathfind distance on intersection, that prevent stuck pedestrians on such a long intersections, however this option can affect simulation speed

data.name: Settings_RestoreDataMessage
data.value: Do you really want to restore nodes data? The restored data will replace all existing nodes data.

data.name: Settings_SelectMiddleNodesDiscription
data.value: If this option is disabled, the middle nodes will move to clicked position

data.name: Settings_ToggleUndergroundButtons
data.value: Press {0} to enter and {1} to exit

data.value: Click to align with this corner

data.name: Tool_InfoChangeMainMode
data.value: Hold {0} to change main slope direction

data.name: Tool_InfoClickToSelectFirstAlign
data.value: Click to select corner you want to align

data.name: Tool_InfoDragCenterFree
data.value: Drag to change position Hold {0} to change elevation

data.name: Tool_InfoDragCornerFree
data.value: Drag to change corner position Hold {0} to change corner elevation

data.name: Tool_InfoDragMainSlopeDirectionEnd
data.value: Drag this end to change main slope direction

data.name: Tool_InfoDropMainSlopeDirectionEnd
data.value: Drop this end to change main slope direction

data.name: Tool_InfoInsertCrossingNodeWithModifier
data.value: Click with {0} to insert crossing node

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectAlignRelative
data.value: Select corner you want to align with

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectMainSlopeDirection
data.value: Change to desired main slope direction

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectNewMainSlopeDirectionEnd
data.value: Select end position of main slope direction

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectToAlign
data.value: Select corners you want to align

data.name: Tool_InfoTooCloseNode
data.value: Can't insert node Too close to nearby node
